title: Mwansa the Great
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Africa

abstract: An eight-year-old boy who aspires to be a hero embarks upon a journey to prove his greatness, with unexpected consequences.
description: A little boy sees himself as 'Mwansa the great', a full-grown warrior hunting lions. His little sister also visualises herself as an adult, 'Princess Shula' who is responsible for disciplining and looking after Mwansa.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002798; BAFTA Award winners and nominees; Active; 2013
